| -------- | --------- | ------------------- | -------- | ----------- |

## Events

| Event          | Description                           | Type                  |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `pageRendered` | Emitted when a page has been rendered | `CustomEvent<number>` |
